A collaborative approach to real estate private equity

We’re investors and advisors

Capital Partners is a private equity firm that invests in great real estate companies for the long-term.

Investment Approach

We deliver more than growth capital—we build relationships, becoming a trusted resource that empowers management teams. We provide strategic counsel and leverages a robust network, capital markets savvy, data, and best practices to serve our investors and partner companies.

Partnering with companies to help them grow

Since 2014, we’ve invested in a portfolio of companies across 40 states. We design our investments collaboratively with each management team because each company is one of a kind, with its own story, and is uniquely valued by us.

LOREM IPSUM

Multi-family Housing

Urban Atlantic

Urban Atlantic is a real estate development and investment firm active in urban growth markets on the East Coast. Among other investments, they have completed over $1.5 billion in developments, creating nearly 7,000 units of housing, 800,000 square feet of commercial property, and 700 acres of developed land.
